MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL45 postcode area of Llanbedr, affecting properties in Riverside Bungalows, The Mill and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:45AM on 11th March 2021.
